reviewText: My family LOVES the American Hoggers! Wish they'd get their show going again & keep it what it is... hog huntin show!
Love this series!! Really want season 3 to come out on dvd, and soon!!
American Hoggers Seasons 1 And 2 Was Excellent . I Can't Wait Until The Next Season Come On Disc .

My daughters LOVE this show. They were so excited to get the season on DVD for Christmas. There's even talks of changing their names to Lea & Chrystal & becoming hog hunters when they're old enough! Lol This set arrived on time & in perfect condition. Thanks amazon!
